title: Wind Walk
content:
Wind Walk Level 6 Transmutation Spell Transform yourself and all nearby party members into tiny clouds of mist to avoid attacks. You become Resistant to non-magical damage, gain Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity and Strength Saving Throws, and become tiny in size. Until Long Rest While transformed, you won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk. 9m Action Level 6 Spell Slot
